title: Scaffold Project Structure
description: Generate an entire project structure with multiple files and folders.

initialFiles.content:
# Challenge: Scaffold Project Structure

Generate a complete Express.js API project structure.

## Requirements
- RESTful API structure
- Routes, controllers, models separation
- Middleware folder
- Config folder
- Basic error handling

hints.text: Ask Claude to scaffold the entire structure. Mention all the folders and files you need.
Try: 'Scaffold an Express API with src/routes, src/controllers, src/middleware, src/models, and src/config folders'

Ask: 'Create a complete Express.js API structure: src/app.js (main), src/routes/index.js (router setup), src/controllers/userController.js, src/middleware/errorHandler.js, src/models/User.js, src/config/index.js. Include basic boilerplate in each.'

solution.approach: Request the complete structure with all folders and files specified.
solution.example: Scaffold a complete Express.js API project structure
alternativeApproaches: Start with structure, then add content

learningPoints: Claude can generate entire project structures
Request boilerplate content in each file
